snippet: A day before the caucus results are announced, Mitt Romney swings through Maine.
abstract: A day before the caucus results are announced, Mitt Romney swings through Maine.
lead_paragraph: PORTLAND, Me. --  A day before the results of the Maine caucuses are to be announced, Mitt Romney, holding a town hall-style meeting here on Friday, touted his conservative politics - and his New England bona fides.

headline.main: Romney Makes His Case in Maine, Touting His New England Roots
